org.sindice.siren.solr.schema

Class TextDatatype

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.solr.schema.Datatype
      • org.sindice.siren.solr.schema.TextDatatype

  • public class TextDatatype
extends Datatype
    TextDatatype is the basic datatype implementation for configurable text analysis.

    Analyzers for datatypes using this implementation should be defined in the datatype configuration file.

    • Field Summary

        subclasses should initialize themselves with the args provided and remove valid arguments. leftover arguments will cause an exception. Common boolean properties have already been handled.
        Overrides:

      • setAnalyzer

        public void setAnalyzer(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
        Description copied from class: Datatype
        Sets the Analyzer to be used when indexing values of this datatype.

        The default implementation throws a SolrException. Subclasses that override this method need to ensure the behavior of the analyzer is consistent with the implementation of toInternal.

        Overrides:
        setAnalyzer in class Datatype
        See Also:
        #toInternal, Datatype.setQueryAnalyzer(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer), Datatype.getAnalyzer()

      • setQueryAnalyzer

        public void setQueryAnalyzer(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
        Description copied from class: Datatype
        Sets the Analyzer to be used when querying values of this datatype.

        The default implementation throws a SolrException. Subclasses that override this method need to ensure the behavior of the analyzer is consistent with the implementation of toInternal.

        Overrides:
        setQueryAnalyzer in class Datatype
        See Also:
        #toInternal, Datatype.setAnalyzer(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer), Datatype.getQueryAnalyzer()
